title: lp-do-ideas Standing Artifact Registry (registry.v2)
description: Registry of standing artifacts monitored by lp-do-ideas. Adds explicit artifact taxonomy, trigger policy, and propagation mode controls for source-triggered intake with fail-closed defaults.

registry_version.description: Schema version for taxonomy-aware registry. Must be registry.v2.

trigger_threshold.description: Active trigger threshold policy for section-level semantic checks used by legacy classification paths.

t1_semantic_sections.description: Section heading keywords used by T1-conservative semantic-delta classification.

unknown_artifact_policy.description: Global default for artifacts not present in registry: do not admit dispatches.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last registry update.

artifacts.description: Registered standing artifacts with explicit taxonomy and trigger semantics.

artifact_entry.description: A single registered standing artifact with explicit trigger and propagation behavior.

artifact_id.description: Registry key. Format: <BIZ>-<DOMAIN>-<descriptor> in uppercase. Example: HBAG-MARKET-PACK.

path.description: Relative path to artifact file from repo root.

domain.description: Standing information domain classification for this artifact.

artifact_class.description: Artifact taxonomy class used for trigger eligibility and anti-loop controls.

trigger_policy.description: Admission policy for this artifact. manual_override_only allows explicit operator-triggered use but no default admission.

propagation_mode.description: Propagation behavior when artifact deltas imply downstream updates.

depends_on.description: Upstream artifact IDs this artifact semantically depends on.

produces.description: Downstream artifact IDs produced or refreshed when this artifact is updated.

last_known_sha.description: Last known content hash for this artifact. Null until first delta is processed.

registered_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this artifact was added to the registry.

active.description: Whether this artifact is actively monitored.

notes.description: Optional free-text notes about this artifact entry.
